Package game.actors.creatures

Class SpiritGoat

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.creatures.Creature
game.actors.creatures.SpiritGoat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Curable, Reproductive
public class SpiritGoat extends Creature implements Curable, Reproductive
A mystical creature that passively roams around the map.

Represents a "Spirit Goat" with low health and wandering behaviour. The Spirit Goat has a limited lifespan represented by a rot countdown attribute. If not cured in time, the goat will disappear from the map.

This creature does not engage in combat or perform any special actions aside from wandering.

Author:
Mohanad Al-Mansoob Modified by: Arielle Ocampo

  • Constructor Details

    • SpiritGoat

      public SpiritGoat(NPCController controller)
      Constructor for the Spirit Goat.

      Initializes the Spirit Goat with a name, display character, hit points, wandering behaviour, and a rot countdown attribute.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Handles the goat's behaviour each turn.

      Decreases the rot countdown. If the countdown reaches zero, the goat disappears from the map. Otherwise, continues normal wandering behaviour.

      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Creature
      Parameters:
      actions - list of possible actions
      lastAction - the previous action performed
      map - the map the actor is on
      display - the display to output messages
      Returns:
      the action to perform for the turn

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Spirit Goat, including its remaining rot countdown.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Actor
      Returns:
      a string describing the goat and its countdown

    • cure

      public void cure(Actor actor, Location location)
      Cures the Spirit Goat by restoring its rot countdown to the maximum value.
      Specified by:
      cure in interface Curable

      public void reproduce(GameMap map, Location location)

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns a list of actions that other actors can perform on this goat.

      If the other actor has the Ability.CURE capability, they are allowed to perform a CureAction on the Spirit Goat.

      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Creature
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the actor interacting with this goat
      direction - the direction of the other actor relative to this goat
      map - the map the goat is on
      Returns:
      a list of allowable actions
